item.title: Making decision to go right or left with Binary Search.
item.description: Making decision to go right or left with Binary Search. This post will be discussing approaches to certain problems which strictly teaches binary search. I will not be presenting any solutions just discussing the approaches. Single Element in Sorted Array Description: You are given a sorted array consisting of only integers where every element appears exactly twice, except for one element which appears exactly once. Return the single element that appears only once.
